identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a digital ledger that feels like a high-end terminal for precious metals, not a spreadsheet.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Jewelry elegance.
Emotion First: Trust, Value, and Permanence.
Content is King: Data is the art. Numbers must be beautiful.
Contrast: Gold on Black. High legibility.

project.name: Emergent AI – Kuyumcu / Sarraf / Döviz Web Uygulaması
project.core_rule: HAS ALTIN (Pure Gold) is the only accounting currency. All values convert to this.
project.theme_strategy: Luxury Dark Mode (Default) with Light Mode option.

usage.h1: text-4xl md:text-5xl font-serif font-medium tracking-tight text-primary

rules: Use 'Tracing Beam' borders for active market rates.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(212,175,55,0.3)] transition-all duration-300 font-sans font-semibold rounded-md px-6 py-2
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 border border-border font-sans rounded-md px-6 py-2
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent/10 hover:text-accent font-sans rounded-md px-4 py-2

cards.base: bg-card border border-border/50 shadow-xl rounded-lg overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-md font-sans transition-all

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
HAS ALTIN is the source of truth.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette. 2. Install necessary fonts. 3. Create the layout structure (Sidebar + Header + Main Content). 4. Implement the WebSocket connection immediately in a Context provider. 5. Build the Dashboard using the 'Control Room' grid. 6. Ensure all financial inputs allow for high precision (milyem).
